definition: imagination unrestricted by reality, indulge in fantasies
details:
noun
- imagination unrestricted by reality
= example: imagination unrestricted by reality
= synonyms: phantasy
- something many people believe that is false
= synonyms: illusion
- fiction with a large amount of imagination in it
= synonyms: phantasy
verb
- indulge in fantasies
= synonyms: fantasize, fantasise
